subject: Science
title: My Amazing Body
learningObjectives: Identify and name major external body parts (head, shoulders, knees, toes).
Understand that our bodies can do many things, like run, jump, and play.
Learn the importance of keeping our bodies healthy (eating good food, washing hands).

content.body: Our bodies are amazing! We can run, jump, and play. Let's learn about the parts of our body.

content.alt: A simple drawing of a child with labels for head, arms, and legs.

content.body: We have a head, shoulders, knees, and toes. Can you point to your nose?

questions.question: What part of your body do you use to see?
What should we do to keep our bodies healthy?

content.body: ¡Nuestros cuerpos son asombrosos! Podemos correr, saltar y jugar. Vamos a aprender sobre las partes de nuestro cuerpo.

questions.question: ¿Qué parte de tu cuerpo usas para ver?
¿Qué debemos hacer para mantener nuestro cuerpo sano?
